1.descricao:
Flying

Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

2.descricao:
First strike

{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
2.texto:
"The soldier's path is worn smooth by the tread of many feet—all in one direction, none returning."
—Oracle en-Vec

3.texto: These spirits of the air are winsome and wild and cannot be truly contained. Only marginally intelligent, they often substitute whimsy for strategy, delighting in mischief and mayhem.

4.descricao:
Flying

{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
4.texto: If only every message were as perfect as its bearer.

5.descricao: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.
5.texto: Rainclouds don't last long in Shiv, but that doesn't stop the lightning.

regras.texto: Each target must receive at least 1 damage. You can't choose a target to take zero damage.
You can't choose zero targets. You must choose at least one target.

6.texto:
Sharpen your ears
—Elvish expression meaning
"grow wiser"

regras.texto: The ability can target an already untapped land.
The ability must target two different lands. It can't be activated if there is just one land to target.

7.texto:
"I always charge a little extra to take on a pegasus. They fly like eagles, kick like mules, and hide like hermits."
—Tahlil en-Dal, bounty hunter

8.texto:
Little dreamt could seem so cruel
As waiting for the wings outspread,
The jagged teeth, the burning eyes,
And dagger-claws that clench to nerves.

9.descricao: {0}: Return Blinking Spirit to its owner's hand.
9.texto:
"Don't look at it Maybe it'll go away"
—Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician

10.descricao: Return Broken Fall to its owner's hand: Regenerate target creature.
10.texto:
"I think I used up all my good luck and all my bad luck in the same fall."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

11.descricao: When Cackling Fiend enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
11.texto: Its windpipe is only the first to amplify its maddening laughter.

regras.texto: If the opponent has no cards in hand, this has no effect.

12.descricao: Destroy all lands or all creatures. Creatures destroyed this way can't be regenerated.
12.texto: Radiant's eyes flashed. "Go, then," the angel spat at Serra, "and leave this world to those who truly care."

regras.texto: You choose land or creatures when the spell resolves.

13.descricao:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Cinder Marsh doesn't untap during your next untap step.

14.descricao:
Enchant creature

You control enchanted creature.

regras.texto: You take control of a creature, but Auras enchanting and Equipment attached to the creature do not change controller.

16.texto: They are Phyrexia's couriers; the messages they carry are inscribed on their slick hides.

17.descricao: Each player returns a creature he or she controls to its owner's hand.

19.descricao: Whenever an opponent plays a land, put a +1/+1 counter on Dirtcowl Wurm.
19.texto: Few of Rath's rivers follow a steady course, so many new channels are carved for them.

regras.texto: A spell or ability that tells a player to "put a land onto the battlefield" does not count as playing a land.

20.texto:
"I implore you not to forget the horrors of the past. You would have us start the Brothers' War anew"
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi heretic

regras.texto: This is not modal. If the target changes from an artifact to an enchantment or vice versa, this still destroys it.

21.descricao: {T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
21.texto:
"Teferi is a problem student. Always late for class. No appreciation for constructive use of time."
—Barrin, progress report

22.descricao:
Drifting Meadow enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

regras.texto: Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

23.descricao: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Lyrist: Destroy target enchantment.

24.descricao: Each player puts a creature card from his or her graveyard onto the battlefield.
24.texto:
"Death—an outmoded concept. We sleep, and we change."
—Sitrik, birth priest

25.descricao: Whenever a creature dies, that creature's controller may draw a card.
25.texto: Life is eternal. A lifetime is ephemeral.

26.descricao:
Enchant land

Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).
26.texto: The forest was too lush for the brothers to despoil—almost.

regras.texto: The color of mana to be generated is chosen when tapping the land for mana.

27.descricao: {T}: Fire Ants deals 1 damage to each other creature without flying.
27.texto: Visitors to Shiv fear the dragons, the goblins, or the viashino. Natives fear the ants.

28.texto:
"A dash of cool water does wonders to clear a cluttered battlefield."
—Vibekke Ragnild, Witches and War

29.descricao: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

30.texto: They were formidable even before they learned the use of weapons.

31.descricao: Choose one — Target player gains 3 life; or prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

32.descricao: Heat Ray deals X damage to target creature.
32.texto: It's not known whether the Thran built the device to forge their wonders or to defend them.

33.descricao: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

regras.texto: Whether or not a creature has flying is only checked on resolution.

34.descricao: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
34.texto:
"The true dishonor for a soldier is surviving the war."
—Telim'Tor

regras.texto: An "attacking creature" is one that has been declared as an attacker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield attacking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be an attacking creature through the end of combat step, even if the player it was attacking has left the game, or the planeswalker it was attacking has left combat.

35.descricao: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

regras.texto: You can fetch any of the "Snow-Covered" lands, since they all also have the supertype basic.

This ability has an "intervening 'if' clause." That means (1) the ability won't trigger at all unless any one of your opponents controls more lands than you, and (2) the ability will do nothing if you control at least as many lands as each of your opponents by the time it resolves.
You shuffle your library if you search, even if you don't put any basic land cards into your hand.

36.descricao: Lhurgoyf's power is equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.
36.texto:
"Ach Hans, run It's the lhurgoyf"
—Saffi Eriksdotter, last words

regras.texto: A "creature card" is any card with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact, Enchantment, or Land. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature cards.

37.descricao: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
37.texto: A lightning elemental once killed an entire tribe of merfolk—simply by going for a swim.

38.descricao: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

regras.texto: The creatures which are sacrificed can't be regenerated.

Both players exile their creature cards at once. Then both players sacrifice all creatures they control at once. Then both players put all creatures they exiled onto the battlefield. If there are any choices involved for a given step, the current player makes their choices first, then the other player, and finally you do the action all at once.

"All cards he or she exiled this way" refers only to the cards exiled in the first part of the effect. If a replacement effect (such as Leyline of the Void) exiles any of the sacrificed creatures instead of putting them into the graveyard, those cards aren't returned to the battlefield.

39.texto:
One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.
—Llanowar penalty for trespassing

40.descricao: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
40.texto:
"Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch."
—Naimah, Femeref philosopher

regras.texto: It can choose itself. It has to if there are no other creatures.

41.descricao: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.
41.texto:
"The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy."
—Volrath

42.descricao:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
42.texto: Only by sacrificing any semblance of defense could Gerrard best Greven.

43.descricao: {U}: Manta Riders gains flying until end of turn.
43.texto:
"Water is firmament to the finned."
—Oracle en-Vec

44.texto:
"A skilled decoy can throw your enemies off your trail. A master decoy can survive to do it again."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

45.descricao:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. Mogg Hollows doesn't untap during your next untap step.

46.descricao:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

When Nekrataal enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. That creature can't be regenerated.
46.texto:
"I have seen the horrors Kaervek has freed. My Betrayal is certain—but of Kaervek or of Jamuraa, I cannot say."
—Jolrael

regras.texto: Nothing happens if there are no non-artifact, non-black creatures on the battlefield when it enters the battlefield.

47.texto:
"He cocooned himself alone in his workshop for months. When he finally emerged, all broad grins and excited chatter, I knew he'd found his answer."
—Barrin, master wizard

48.descricao:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
48.texto: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

49.descricao:
At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Pestilence.

{B}: Pestilence deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

regras.texto: Each activation is considered a new damage effect. An activation can only be 1 point of damage.
Note that "until end of turn" effects wear off after "at the beginning of the end step" triggered abilities, so an artifact that animates until end of turn can keep this on the battlefield.

It will stay on the battlefield if there is a creature that is put into the graveyard during the end step. This is because this ability will not trigger at all if there is at least one creature on the battlefield as the end step begins.

50.descricao: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
50.texto: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.

51.descricao: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
51.texto:
"No fair Since when does a bug get ta munch on me?"
—Squee, goblin cabin hand

52.descricao: {2}{G}: Plated Rootwalla gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
52.texto:
" . . . And the third little boar built his house out of rootwalla plates . . . ."
—Skyshroud children's story

regras.texto: If this card's ability is activated by one player, then another player takes control of it on the same turn, the second player can't activate its ability that turn.

53.descricao:
Polluted Mire enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

regras.texto: Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

54.descricao: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
54.texto: Occasionally members of the Institute of Arcane Study acquire a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

55.descricao: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
55.texto: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

56.descricao: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the creature, tap it.

regras.texto: You may target an untapped creature with Ray of Command.

The creature returns to the opponent when the "until end of turn" effect wears off during the cleanup step. It taps during the Cleanup step (if it is not already tapped), so any abilities triggered off it tapping happen at that time.
You tap the creature when you lose control of it for any reason -- because Ray of Command's effect ends, or because a spell or ability causes another player to gain control of it.

57.descricao: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

regras.texto: You lose life equal to the converted mana cost of the card you're bringing back, so if you Reanimate Volrath's Shapeshifter, you lose three life, regardless of what the next card down is.

58.descricao:
Remote Isle enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

regras.texto: Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

59.texto:
"But no one heard the snake's gentle hiss for peace over the elephant's trumpeting of war."
—Afari, Tales

60.descricao: Rolling Thunder deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.
60.texto: "Such rage," thought Vhati, gazing up at the thunderhead from the Predator. "It is Greven's mind manifest."

regras.texto: X can be zero.
If X is greater than zero, you can't choose zero targets. You must choose between 1 and X targets. If X is zero, you can't choose any targets.

61.descricao:
Enchant creature

Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
61.texto:
"First blood isn't as important as last blood."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

62.descricao: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
62.texto: Serra told them to guard Urza as he healed. Five years they stood.

63.descricao: Sacrifice Sanctum Guardian: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature or player this turn, prevent that damage.

64.descricao: Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.
64.texto: Even the landscape turned against Sarsour, first rising up and pelting him, then rearranging itself so he could no longer find his way.

65.texto:
"Flourishing during the Ice Age, these wurms were the bane of all Kjeldorans. Their great size and ferocity made them the subject of countless nightmares—they embodied the worst of the Ice Age."
—Kjeldor: Ice Civilization

66.texto: The only sound was the gentle clicking of the faeries' wings. Then those intruders who were still standing turned and fled. One thing was certain: they didn't think the Scryb were very funny anymore.

67.descricao: Whenever Seasoned Marshal attacks, you may tap target creature.
67.texto: There are only two rules of tactics: never be without a plan, and never rely on it.

regras.texto: Can target an already tapped creature if you want.

68.texto:
"We shun them not for their dream but for their refusal to let such a noble dream die a noble death."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

regras.texto: It can use its tap ability to untap itself.

69.descricao:
Flying

Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

regras.texto: If Sengir Vampire deals nonlethal damage to a creature and then a different effect or damage source causes that creature to be put into a graveyard later in the turn, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger and it will get a +1/+1 counter.

Each time a creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, check whether Sengir Vampire had dealt any damage to it at any time during that turn. If so, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger. It doesn't matter who controlled the creature or whose graveyard it was put into.
If Sengir Vampire and a creature it dealt damage to are both put into a graveyard at the same time, Sengir Vampire's ability will trigger, but it will do nothing when it resolves.

70.descricao: {B}, Pay 1 life: Sewer Rats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than three times each turn.
70.texto:
You lie down with rats, and the rats run away.
—Suq'Ata insult

71.descricao: Shower of Sparks deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to target player.
71.texto: The viashino had learned how to operate the rig through trial and error—mostly error.

regras.texto: If the creature leaves the battlefield before this resolves, it still damages the player.

72.descricao: Skyshroud Elite gets +1/+2 as long as an opponent controls a nonbasic land.
72.texto:
"Civilization is a conspiracy to disguise the mutilation of nature."
—Skyshroud elite creed

73.descricao:
Slippery Karst enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

regras.texto: Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.

74.descricao: Shadow (This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
74.texto:
"Children of the Ruins, raised to be warriors, know that life begins when another speaks their names."
—Soltari Tales of Life

75.descricao: {1}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by target attacking creature with flying.
75.texto: The true names of birds are songs woven into their souls.

76.descricao: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
76.texto:
Count carefully the souls and see that none are lost.
—Vec teaching

regras.texto: Does not trigger on a card on the battlefield being changed into a creature.
The ability will not trigger on itself entering the battlefield, but it will trigger on any other creature that is put onto the battlefield at the same time.
Two Soul Wardens entering the battlefield at the same time will each cause the other's ability to trigger.
The life gain is mandatory.

77.descricao:
Spike Colony enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.

{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Colony: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

78.descricao:
Spike Feeder enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Feeder: You gain 2 life.

79.descricao:
Spike Weaver enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.

{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Weaver: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Weaver: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

regras.texto: The second ability includes your own creatures as well.

80.descricao:
Spike Worker enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Spike Worker: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

81.descricao: Steam Blast deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.
81.texto: The viashino knew of the cracked pipes but deliberately left them unmended to bolster the rig's defenses.

82.descricao: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
82.texto: Kerrick's corrupt domain swelled like a blister on Tolaria's skin.

regras.texto: This is loss of life, not damage. It can't be prevented.

83.descricao:
Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.

{W}: Return enchanted creature to its owner's hand.
83.texto:
"And darkness shall be cast from me
For my soul resides in the Sun."
—Femeref dirge

84.descricao: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

regras.texto: If the creature has a negative power, the player does not lose life. It acts the same as if it had a power of zero.
The amount of life that's gained is equal to the power of the targeted creature as it last existed on the battlefield.

85.descricao: Two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.
85.texto: Although the elves of Argoth always considered them a nuisance, the pixies made fine allies during the war against the machines.

86.descricao: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

87.descricao: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

88.descricao:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool. Thalakos Lowlands doesn't untap during your next untap step.

90.descricao: {1}{G}: Target creature blocks Trumpeting Armodon this turn if able.
90.texto: These are its last days. But it will not go quietly.

91.texto:
"If fear is the only tool you have left, then you'll never control me."
—Xantcha, to Gix

regras.texto: Players with less than 2 cards discard all they have.

92.texto:
"Oi oi oi, me gotta hurt in 'ere,
Oi oi oi, me smell a ting is near,
Gonna bosh 'n gonna nosh
'n da hurt'll disappear."
—Troll chant

{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.

{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool. Vec Townships doesn't untap during your next untap step.

95.texto: At a distance, we mistook the sound for a waterfall . . . .

97.descricao:
Protection from white

{1}{R}: Wildfire Emissary gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
97.texto:
"The efreet is a striding storm with a voice that crackles like fire."
—Qhattib, vizier of Amiqat

98.texto:
"No bird soars too high, if he soars with his own wings."
—William Blake,
The Marriage of Heaven and Hell

99.descricao: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.
99.texto:
"To fill your mind with knowledge, we must start by emptying it."
—Barrin, master wizard

100.descricao: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
